website_summaries.verdict: A floating hammock that is comparable to other models but is available at a slightly lower price.
pros: This floating hammock is easy to assemble and features a comfortable fabric
The unit deflates and can be quickly rolled up to transport or store
It comes with a small manual air pump and can support up to 265 pounds
cons: The drawstrings that hold the inflatable pillows in at each end can loosen if they are not properly secured

customer_reviews.title: New Level of Relaxation in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool lounger. I'm 5'11" 200 lbs and it's works just fine for me. Wish I would have seen these things long ago. Tip: insert the bags before you blow them up and put the right size bag in the right tube. The two are different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Defective ... sewing is off. Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these, but the sewing is completely off on both of the floating seats. One side is too small to fully inflate the float and the other side is huge and the float is loose inside. It’s that’s way on BOTH of the floating chairs. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the floating hammock!
customer_reviews.text: We love the floating hammock! So relaxing to float in the pool yet still be in the water, not on top of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great item except concerned about durability of the plastic floats
customer_reviews.text: We like the versatility of this float, and the webbing material seems very durable. What is questionable is the durability of the inflatable bolsters at each end - the material is thin and could easily be punctured, or seams torn open, leaving the entire purchase unusable. Fingers crossed the heat or repetitive use does not render the float a flop.
customer_reviews.author: Qbet

customer_reviews.title: Great little float!
customer_reviews.text: This is made of very durable material, will probably last forever. Holds my husband who weighs 210 lbs. We put a super-size noodle (cut it in half) in the ends so that we don't have to worry about air in the things that come with it. Works great! Folds up into a small roll, easy to take to the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialKGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Inflatible Raft Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these floats for about 10 years and found them to be one of the most comfortable for lounging in the pool. When that one broke I purchased this one which appears to be identical in quality. The inflatable portion of this float is completely secured by the heavy duty mesh fabric which will prevent it from being abused and leaking. Easy to blow up and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The Float Everyone Wants
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after my kids kept stealing my tube. They like these better now! Lol. They sit in it and call it their boat. Easy to inflate. Just put the float inside before blowing up. My 6’ 1” fits as easily as my 4 foot kid. Floats well in deep water and 2 feet of water. Great purchase. Bonus that there is two. Roll up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu518

customer_reviews.title: Three Piece Large Hammocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hammocks because of the pattern but they are bigger and longer than I like for my small pool. I do not like the inflatables are additional pieces that slide in. The ties holding them in are a nuisance. The weave is a bit rough too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Geary

customer_reviews.title: Best Pool Float Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My friends/family love this pool float, and so do I. It's easy to inflate -- just two small, round bolster-type pillows. Easy to deflate for storage in winter, too. Comfortable for folks of any height. Two of my pregnant friends said that floating on this was the only time they were truly comfortable once they started showing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacation!
customer_reviews.text: We brought these on vacation and they were perfect for our packing needs. They folded up nicely when they weren't inflated and don't weigh much. They also roll up nicely when inflated, and weren't too difficult to carry between our room, the pool, and the ocean. Next time I will bring a little string or something to keep them rolled up to make carrying them around even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Christina  P Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and relaxing but not recommend for toddlers or must be supervise
customer_reviews.author: Chak

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I really love these hammocks. These are great in so many different positions (laying, sitting with a floaty under each arm, or front and back) so great for floating and drinking a pina colada
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: These work great for your community pool or for travel. Just let the air out of the inflatable parts and fold up for travel. Then inflate upon arrival. Reverse for travel home
customer_reviews.author: Ritt

customer_reviews.title: Swimming goody
customer_reviews.text: A small package turns into a floating bed. I like this portable buoy that could be easily packed when you go swimming with family and friends. Look forward to this summer vacation!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So comfy. I'm 5 ft 7 and it fits under my knees and head perfectly
customer_reviews.author: cheryl osburn

customer_reviews.title: Not an adult hammock.
customer_reviews.text: Only a small child can use this product. It’s not like a hammock for an adult. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use without the things that float which deflate due to holes
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. We blew them up and headed to the pool. One of the tubes was flat by the time we got to the pool from a leaking seam. I used the second one in the pool and enjoyed it. I got out of the pool and set it by my chair. Within 30 minutes, one of the tubes was flat. This all happened day one of use. Not good at all....
customer_reviews.author: D&D

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This was what I was looking for to relax on top of the pool and tan at the same time .. price was reasonable for two. Easy to Inflate and set up. I suggested to use the Electrical air pump mattress to inflate to save time . The material is durable
customer_reviews.author: maria ly

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I really like these so far. They hold you out of the water at just the right depth for me (200 lbs) They do work fairly well as a seat also. Easy to setup and break down
customer_reviews.author: jweaks

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Vinyl
customer_reviews.text: These are not comfortable and the pillows dont stay in the sling. The smell of the vinyl is toxic. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Connie  Tarsook

customer_reviews.title: BUY now!!
customer_reviews.text: Order NOW!! This is an amazing product and worth every penny. Easy to inflate and deflate by using your mouth, pump not needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gadsby

customer_reviews.title: Flotation not fully supported.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is hardy and sufficient to both pool and ocean, but the only two float devices are the pillows that are inserted at each end. No flotation support in center. I returned my order.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniup

customer_reviews.title: stiff on the sides
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect the material to be so thick. My friend has one and I bought because hers is so comfy in different positions. This one is not soft or flexible like hers. Its not terrible just not what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love this float. So comfortable and great for a large person. Material is sturdy and comfortable. I recommend you insert the baffles into the ends before you inflate them - you'll never be able to slide them in once inflated.
customer_reviews.author: LisaT

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my family's favorite float, everyone fights over who gets to sit in it. It makes you feel weightless and is the most relaxing float we've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, easy to together and to travel with. One of my favorite pool floats.
customer_reviews.author: NanaKK

customer_reviews.title: awesome and compact for the beach
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE.. USE THEM IN MY HOTTUB FOR THE SUMMER AND WINTER TO FLOAT AROUND.
customer_reviews.author: colin King

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the style and delivery time which were spot on. However, one of the loops that the string threads to secure the inflatable pillow on an end broke off immediately following assembly. Given the cost, I suspect the life expectancy is short for these floats.
customer_reviews.author: Heather V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Float
customer_reviews.text: My parents who hate everything love this float. I've used it and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Good hammock lounge for the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for lounging in the pool. I enjoy it. Same with my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Needed the 2 inflatable pillows
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was expeditious. Quality of inflatable pillows is questionable but if they last a year we will be thrilled. We bought this whole set because we needed to replace our other pillows. It was cheaper it buy the whole set than the 2 inflatable pillows. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a rough brick border around my pool and most inflatables don’t stand a chance. The fabric on this seems to protect it really well so far. Love lounging in my pool with this.
customer_reviews.author: V. Vandenberghe

customer_reviews.title: Buy this not another big inflatable
customer_reviews.text: These are great for boating because they don't take up much space and you only have to fill two small tubes for it to be ready to use. You really don't need an entire inflated pool raft or inner tube. Highly recommend. I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you sit somewhat in the water, not on the water like a raft. The material is comfortable against your skin, and you don't stick to it like a plastic raft. I'm 5'10" and I was afraid it might feel too short, but it works for me. Easy to carry, too. Not bulky like a blow-up raft. I've only used it twice, so far, but it seems like it will hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Detmer

customer_reviews.title: The air pillow deflated in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: They are not as perforated as they appear and don't work well for pool excercises. The head pillow deflated within 3 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pool lounge arrived without blow-up insert
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this two of these pool lounges. One arrived with all its parts. The other one arrived without the inflatable inserts. Generally, we really like the one lounge that came with all its parts but I would be hesitant to purchase this item again--worried that the next one would not arrive with everything together.
customer_reviews.author: J L King

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really like the durability. Heavier mesh material that can be put into the washer and the inflatable tubes, that can be take out and put back in, are more heavy duty than normal. Great for deflating and putting into small spaces. Easy to inflate. The small pump that came with the float broke on the first use but not difficult to blow up the usual way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Should have shopped for something more durable for what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Just ok, nothing special. Tubes don't hold air very well, material is a bit rough
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: One of the pillows has leak. Used 1 time. waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: Dadzilla

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this in the pool. It comes with a pump that works great to quickly fill the sides. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilee S

customer_reviews.title: You will love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this SO much! I use it at the lake and can sit on it in the water for hours. Everyone wants to know where I got it. It’s light and easy to carry and you can deflate it for travel. As a bonus, I use it when laying in the sand or on the grass as a mat with a comfortable pillow.
customer_reviews.author: L. GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Chill chill chill
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Easy to blow up. I floated around for a while till someone’s kids started screaming and ruined my state of zen.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from the beach,and we love the product. Compact enough, for two to fit in a beach bag along with everything else you need for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blow up because a hand pump is included. Comfortable and you have different options, you can sit or lay down. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: hairjunkie319

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I like this float becasue it holds up my head so I can actually read or listen to music while floating around. We will use this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabellr

customer_reviews.title: Great pool/lake chair
customer_reviews.text: Not for lying on the stomach but perfect for sitting or lying back in the water
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ashwell

customer_reviews.title: Well made, super comfortable, my new water toy
customer_reviews.text: Great value, well made-not cheap. Very very comfortable. There are two in the box, so I don't have to fight over who gets to use it with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very comfortable. It is nice to stay in the water while floating.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly  H.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Stitching came apart On one of the floats making it unusable
customer_reviews.author: THATGUY

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float
customer_reviews.text: Great float to lay in the pool. Holds you up and out of the water. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dan Self

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: One side of the float was missing the draw string. Did not return it because I purposely ordered it for memorial weekend. Will improvise
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like this float hanmock, easy to carry, just perfect for this summer,
customer_reviews.author: lerongchen

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Insert before inflating. It floats well seems durable if you want comfort try something else
customer_reviews.author: Ron Q

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This product hold up much better than several other inflatables we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C. Spurling

customer_reviews.title: Pools must have
customer_reviews.text: A Swimming Pool's must have float lounge. Everybody loves it
customer_reviews.author: ShengJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my pool, easy storage and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for floating!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect to float in the water at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect float because it can be used 2 different ways
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good material on this product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice strong material instead of the mesh floats that tear by the end of a season and takes up very little space on my lanai when not in use. I love this pattern😊
customer_reviews.author: PJ S.

customer_reviews.title: Really like these floats
customer_reviews.text: The floats are comfortable, but one end has a slow leak so after a few hours it's flat.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Floats Me Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to pack in my travel bag . Holds my 200lb. body just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: In love with these
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Great quality! So fun to float with! Worth the money, purchased two!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Floating Bed
customer_reviews.text: This float is wonderful in the pool! Just relax and float away!
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great for floating on the lake
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our boat for lake floating and love it. For us, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to bring anywhere, inflates quickly, durable around rocky river bottoms and great for pool too
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great float for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great float for your pool to sit in or lay on. Easy to inflate. Live the pump. Ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is made of cheap, plastic inserts that didn't hold air the first time using it. A total waste of your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring back summer time
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 4ft. 11 so the length is perfect for me. Someone taller and heavy make not care for it. But I love floating on this on those hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Svc
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, used twice and neither of the inflatible ends stays inflated, and you can’t buy replacement items
customer_reviews.author: ED BENDER

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: arrived with hole in seam...otherwise great! Will see if seller replaces..
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J Crouse

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this float! So many people have asked me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mebow

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this one because of strings that hold inflatables in ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this one because of strings that hold inflatables in each end. The inflating device poor. Plastic of inflatables needs to be a heavier duty material, we are on a lake with sticks.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl tuma

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable pillow not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the hammock floats. One is fine, the other has a air leak and unusable. Sure hope the inflatable pillow will last as it does not seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Niello

customer_reviews.title: Leaks straight from the package
customer_reviews.text: So we just unboxed this blue float with high expectations. We attempted to air it up, but there is a small hole that leaks air by the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to inflate!!
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the nozzle for pumping up the flotation tubes. Very hard to inflate and then really not enough support for 130 lb woman!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mains

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, very well priced.
customer_reviews.text: New to our pool, but very good start! Intext. pool chaise float.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great pool hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool hammock! Super easy to inflate and rolls up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to take to the river to use as a float. It was fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Presa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Arrived quickly and it’s much more than I expected. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Miller

customer_reviews.title: It fit my 280 pound 6'1" husband just fine. he used it as a chair
customer_reviews.text: One of the blow up inflatables did not hold air from the get go right out of the package when I aired it up the first time. I patched it and the hammock/chair worked out really well. It fit my 280 pound 6'1" husband just fine. he used it as a chair. I would have given it 5 stars but they need to do better on quality control inspections. The other inflatable was solid and no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY MCKNIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Love this floaty
customer_reviews.text: Love this floaty! You can lounge around or you can sit extremely versatile and fun in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holes an very cheap blow up ends hole on seam right out of the box I better get my credit needs throw out not worth my time to e
customer_reviews.text: What a joke cheap blow up on ends pull it out of box and hole on the seam cannot even patch it I want my card credit not taking time I don't have to send this junk back
customer_reviews.author: vicki datkuliak

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: I took this to our condo pool this week and it is fabulous. I’m able to keep cool yet get sun on my arms and legs too. The top floater works as a pillow. I could have sold several on the way Day I was at the pool. Humph... maybe I should consider that. Ha.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: FindUWill Hammock Float Portable Swimming Pool Lounge Inflatable Water Pillow (2 Pack) 4-in-1 Multi-Purpose Inflatable Hammock (Saddle, Lounge Chair, Hammock, Drifter) Portable Pool Float
feature_bullets: Product upgrade 2Pack from 2020/6/26, Including a rose hammock and a blue hammock. Replacement: All hammock Floats sold by FindUWill are covered. If the pillows leaked, we will exchange it in 30days from purchase! In order to guarantee your rights, please contact us as soon as possible.
Inflatable Water Pillow: Inflatable Water Pillow *2 Pairs, Header Pillow -Big air bag ,Footer Pillow-Small air bag, make Float Hammock Portable
Size:51 3/4" x 26",Weight Limit:120kg/265lb.Hammock Float can only hold one people and the total weight could not exceed 120kg/265lb.
Package Included:Float Hammock,Header Pillow,Footer Pillow,Inflator Pump
Safe Tips: Don't Sleep deeply when floating in the sea! Don’t leave your child unattended, even for a second, near water!
